references.paper_title: Linear Time-Frequency Analysis II: Wavelet-Type Representations
references.reason: This paper provides the theoretical foundation for the time-frequency tightness property of the Gabor wavelet activation function, a core component of the proposed FeINFN decoder.

references.paper_title: Learning continuous image representation with local implicit image function
references.reason: This paper introduces the concept of Local Implicit Image Function (LIIF), which is a foundational work for the implicit neural representation (INR) approach used in FeINFN.

references.paper_title: Implicit neural representations with periodic activation functions
references.reason: This paper proposes using periodic activation functions in implicit neural representations (INR), a key architectural decision influencing the design of the FeINFN.

references.paper_title: Image quality assessment: from error visibility to structural similarity
references.reason: This paper introduces the Structural Similarity Index (SSIM), a crucial image quality metric used for evaluating the performance of the proposed FeINFN in comparison to other state-of-the-art methods.

references.paper_title: Hyperspectral image super-resolution via subspace-based low tensor multi-rank regularization
references.reason: This paper is a foundational work in hyperspectral image super-resolution, a closely related field to the main focus of the FeINFN on multispectral and hyperspectral image fusion.
